Data Fields
eccIpuMemCfgPrm Struct Reference

Structure holding ECC configuration parameters of IPU L2RAM /L1Data / L1TAG Memory. More...

#include <ipu_ecc.h>

Data Fields

uint32_t errAutoCorrectEnable
 
uint32_t sRespHFEnable
 
uint32_t dataMask
 
uint32_t eccCodeMask
 
uint32_t memType
 

Detailed Description

Structure holding ECC configuration parameters of IPU L2RAM /L1Data / L1TAG Memory.

Field Documentation

uint32_t eccIpuMemCfgPrm::dataMask

To Enable/Disable data Mask in IPU L2RAM /L1DATA / L1TAG Memory Valid values: TRUE or FALSE

uint32_t eccIpuMemCfgPrm::eccCodeMask

To Enable/Disable ECC code Mask in IPU L2RAM / L1DATA / L1TAG Memory Valid values: TRUE or FALSE

uint32_t eccIpuMemCfgPrm::errAutoCorrectEnable

To Enable/Disable auto correction when 1 Bit error occurs in IPU L2RAM /L1DATA / L1TAG Memory. Valid values: TRUE or FALSE

uint32_t eccIpuMemCfgPrm::memType

ECC IPU Memory Type. For valid values refer enum eccIpuMemType_t

uint32_t eccIpuMemCfgPrm::sRespHFEnable

To Enable/Disable error signal response (Hard Fault) to master i.e. IPU in case of Double Error Detection in IPU L2RAM /L1DATA/L1TAG Memory. Valid values: TRUE or FALSE
